description: TYPO3 v12 Composer Standard Installation - Extensions should only be found in vendor directory

news.reason: Should find georgringer/news in vendor directory

example_news.reason: Should find example/news with example_news extension-key in vendor directory

powermail.reason: Should find example/powermail in vendor directory

custom_tools.reason: Should NOT find - located in invalid typo3conf/ext location for v12

site_package.reason: Should NOT find - located in invalid typo3conf/ext location for v12

notes: For TYPO3 v12+ Composer installations, extensions MUST only be in vendor directory
Extensions in public/typo3conf/ext are invalid and should not be detected
This validates the correct v12 compliance behavior
